Producer: Danny DeVito, Robert Ben Garant, Stacey Sher, Michael Shamberg, John Landgraf
Screenwriter: Robert Ben Garant, Thomas Lennon, Kerri Kenney
Production Co: Jersey Films, 20th Century Fox, Paramount Pictures
Synopsis: Bumbling officers (Thomas Lennon, Ben Garant, Kerri Kenney) of the Reno (Nevada) Police Department finally get an opportunity to attend a law-enforcement convention in Florida. Fun in the sun turns to serious business when terrorists launch a bioattack in the area. With every cop in Miami out sick, it is up to the intrepid Nevada cops to serve and protect the unfortunate populace.
Title: RENO 911!: Miami
